short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds probabilistic gender info to Google Scholar and PubMed searches

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In many fields, men and women are not cited at the level that one would expect given their prevalence in the field. One way we can help mitigate this bias is by making the perceived genders of first and last authors of papers more transparent in the search for references. Towards this goal, this extension adds probabilistic gender information to paper searches on Google Scholar and PubMed.
